patthana16.90:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana16.90:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
